channel.title: pdf on My notes and snippets

item.title: encrypted password protected pdf
item.description: encrypted password protected pdf During your work you might stumble upon an password protected PDF. It’s possible to extract a password hash that can be cracked with hashcat. source pdfid check if pdf is encrypted (/Encrypt) root@kali:/mnt/hgfs/_shared_folder# pdfid -n "0ld is g0ld.pdf" PDFiD 0.2.7 0ld is g0ld.pdf PDF Header: %PDF-1.6 obj 15 endobj 15 stream 5 endstream 5 xref 2 trailer 2 startxref 2 /Page 1 /Encrypt 2 /ObjStm 1 pdf-parser Where is /Encrypt (object 43)
